nodes.text: Our Mistress of the Bad Boys Prison
Our Mistress of the Bad Boys Prison was a prison. Cell block disciplinarian Prod worked there for some time.

Our Mistress of the Bad Boys Prison was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
